    • Constructor Detail

      • EmbeddedApplication

        public EmbeddedApplication()
        No argument constructor. This constructor should be used when the application is not wrapped inside the AppContainer (i.e. no auto-update mechanism is employed).

      • EmbeddedApplication

        public EmbeddedApplication(java.lang.String appName,
                           java.lang.String appDir,
                           java.lang.String configFile,
                           javafx.application.Application.Parameters parameters,
                           java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Creates embedded application.
        Parameters:
        appName - Application name.
        appDir - Path to application directory.
        configFile - Path to launch configuration file.
        parameters - Application parameters.
        classLoader - Class loader to set to FXML loaders.

                               throws java.net.URISyntaxException
